item.title: Diary
item.description: 08 Dec 2022 PLAN Get familiar with docsy First doc REFs LaTeX Ref 06 Dec 2022 PROGRESS Activate menu in letstry deployed learn-machine [https://goforaditya.github.io/learn-machine/] new name for know-platform. PLAN first book is on Hugo and Docsy cookbook. Need to learn more Hugo Start with know-platform [] REFS Menus on Hugo Markdown Cheatsheet (https://github.com/marketplace/actions/github-pages-action#%EF%B8%8F-static-site-generators-with-nodejs) (https://github.com/marketplace/actions/hugo-setup#%EF%B8%8F-use-hugo-extended) Github Acitons is free* Repository templates 05 Dec 2022 Made HUGO site for personal blog. Posted project ideas on Trello board.
